Player History
Released by Chicago (N) on 11/4/1965...
Drafted in 4th round, 62nd overall pick, by Cleveland in 1968...
Injured on 4/27/1968 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 7/9/1969, off Steve Carlton (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/1971, off Joe Hoerner (TEX)...
Injured on 7/31/1972 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/18/1975 to a 4-year deal worth $2,550,000 per year...
